about.title: About me
about.description: Welcome to my portfolio. Based in Paris, I hold the position of full stack developer at Deltablot and work full-time on the open source project elabFTW. I mainly work with PHP and TypeScript, and have gained some experience with React and Vue/Nuxt. I've loved coding since I was very young and have turned it into my profession; today, I continue to thrive and sharpen my skills. My long-term goal is to move into DevOps. I'll let my portfolio tell you more about my journey.
